extendedInfo.description: Use Toilet Finder to easily locate the nearest public toilets/bathrooms around!This is the biggest world toilet database. More than 60000 toilet places all over the world.The application is based on user-contribution: everyone can report new or missing toilets.The BeTomorrow team.

reviews.title: Not to good
reviews.comment: I have uc and really needed a bathroom on the out skirts of town... Found me nothing.  Horrible when your in pain!
reviews.author: David Hochstein

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: App appears truthful in finding public facilities. Would give 5 stars of I could move app to SD.
reviews.author: Erik Helman

reviews.title: really
reviews.comment: embarrassed me in front of my family, why is there no navigation, un installed.
reviews.author: Damani Plunkett

reviews.title: Just what I need
reviews.comment: Good for traveling
reviews.author: hrj Kane

reviews.title: Oh come on !!!
reviews.comment: Bad app, enough said.
reviews.author: Mark Livsey

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Would be good to submit by GPS location; I don\'t know the address of any of the loos I\'ve visited! Just tried to add two more and the second one won\'t go through, do you have to wait for the first to be moderated?
reviews.author: Graham Lucas

reviews.title: Handy!
reviews.comment: Found a nice bathroom in NYC when I was desperate. Thanks!
reviews.author: Fiona B

reviews.title: :) saved my day
reviews.comment: Just what I was need it. On time.
reviews.author: Catalin L

reviews.title: Enable GPS
reviews.comment: Would like to mark toilet using current location.  It is not always easy to know exact address.   Would also like to edit address and rating, not working for me at least.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: AFTER SEVERAL ATTEMPTS TO LOCATE MY POSITION IT FAILED. HAD GPS AND WIFI ON. DOWNLOADED ANOTHER APP AND IT WORKED FINEQ
reviews.author: Alan Dixon

reviews.title: Great idea but...
reviews.comment: Opening times are needed... When you\'re in an unfamiliar town and desperate for the loo it is tantalising to be told there are ten toilets in the area but no clue of whether they are open!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: XLNT!
reviews.comment: And I agree, we need more space to add notes such as the name of the store, eatery, gas station, park, etc. as well as business hours. Not all places have an address. I would also like to note if the vendor expects you to buy something before using the bathroom. This could be a problem if you don\'t have any money.    >.<    Now if only I could find the same kind of app for public electrical outlets to plug in my phone charger...  [hint-hint!]
reviews.author: Jennifer Grove

reviews.title: Very good application.
reviews.comment: But some locations are inaccurate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app but
reviews.comment: Would like to know the opening times
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Find only few toilets
reviews.author: Shafiur Rahman Patwary

reviews.title: Shaik
reviews.comment: Busy
reviews.author: shaik ziya

reviews.title: Cool idea, but...
reviews.comment: Recommendations: 1. Use GPS coordinates,  Some remote restrooms have no address. 2. Allow users to comment on restrooms, this is very helpful. 3. Need to know if the restroom is for customers only. (gas stations) or see number 2.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than other bathroom finder apps
reviews.comment: This 1 has more than restaurant bathrooms. However it does not say what the location is (ie: library, restaurant, gas station, etc), just an address and how many meters away.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK but...
reviews.comment: Should you be able to (easily) \"Navigate to...\" on transferring to your chosen maps app.? I can\'t. Assuming it\'s this app. and not me - surely this aspect is a \"must\".  @Drew - I don\'t get a list of locations when on Wi-Fi; only when \"data\" is switched on. Assuming that\'s the cause, it won\'t be easy with a Nexus 7.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Most usefull app I have loaded. Does what it says on box!
reviews.author: A Google User
